data.title: Board of Supervisors Meeting Agendas
data.meta_description: Guidance for Public Access to the Board of Supervisors MeetingsThe Board of Supervisors meets in the County Administration North, Board Hearing Room, First Floor, 400 W Civic Center Dr, Santa Ana, (Directions). Regular meetings of the Board are typically held on the second and fourth Tuesdays of each month at 9:30 a.m. and holding in reserve the third Tuesday of the month for closed session and/or special meetings if needed.
data.text:
Guidance for Public Access to the Board of Supervisors Meetings

The Board of Supervisors meets in the County Administration North, Board Hearing Room, First Floor, 400 W Civic Center Dr, Santa Ana, (Directions). Regular meetings of the Board are typically held on the second and fourth Tuesdays of each month at 9:30 a.m. and holding in reserve the third Tuesday of the month for closed session and/or special meetings if needed. View the Board meeting calendar for scheduled meetings. Any exceptions to the location or start time of the meeting will be shown on the Board of Supervisors' Agenda. Please note the current orders and recommendations of the County Health Officer that can be found by visiting: https://occovid19.ochealthinfo.com/article/oc-health-officers-orders-recommendations.

Agendas are available on Wednesday, two weeks prior to the regular Tuesday Board meeting. Supplemental agendas with additional items are available on Friday preceding the Board meeting. Documents associated with agenda items may not include all related or updated data. You may contact the Clerk of the Board at (714) 834-2206, or visit the office at 400 W. Civic Center Drive, Sixth Floor, Santa Ana, CA 92701 for further details.

If you have special needs, such as ADA accommodation or need the services of a language interpreter, the Clerk of the Board can assist you. To make such requests, please call the Board Services Division at least 72 hours prior to the meeting at 714-834-2206. Requests made less than 72 hours prior to the meeting will still receive every effort by Clerk of the Board to fulfill the request. Assistive Listening Devices (ALD’s) are also available from the Clerk of the Board in the Board Room prior to the commencement of the meeting and are to be returned at the end of the meeting. If you have any questions, please contact the Clerk of the Board, Board Services Division at (714) 834-2206 or email at response@ocgov.com.

Attend the Meeting In-Person and Address the Board

You can attend and make comments at Board of Supervisors meetings in person. Additional overflow room is available for the public to watch the meeting and wait to speak.

Watch the Meeting Live Online and Access Board Meeting Media Archive

:Members of the public can view live Internet broadcast of Board meetings and access archived Board meeting videos and audio on-demand.

Listen to the Meeting via Phone

Listen to the live meetings by dialing (866) 590-5055, Access Code: 4138489 while business is being conducted. This is a live, listen only feed. If you are experiencing difficulties or need assistance, please call (855) 886-5400.

Submit eComment

Voice your opinion for upcoming Board meeting agenda items or provide general public comments by emailing response@ocgov.com. All comments submitted before the start of Board meetings will be distributed to the Board members for their consideration and all comments will be added to the administrative record of the meeting.

The County of Orange website language translation service utilizes the Google and Microsoft automated translation services. The County of Orange has made reasonable efforts in order to provide accurate translations, however, no automated or computerized translation is perfect and is not intended to replace human or traditional translation methods. The official text is the English version of the County of Orange website. Any discrepancies or differences created in the translation are not binding and have no legal effect for compliance or enforcement purposes. If any questions arise concerning the accuracy of the information presented by the translated version of the website, please refer to the English version of the website, which is the official version.
